body.name: 4K/2.5K Dash cam Front and Rear, 3.2'' in Display with GSP, WiFi, G-Sensor, Super Night Vision, Loop Recording, 24H Parking Mode, Wide Angle Dash Camera for Cars/Trucks, Supports 256GB Max
body.stockDetail: Only 17 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 10 mins
features: Capture Every Detail: The front and the rear dash cams have UHD 4K(3840*2160P)+FHD 1080P resolutions) crisp video quality and 170°/140° wide viewing angles, keeping you in the know of what's happened to the front and back on the road. With sharp and vivid images, you can read number plates, road signs, and any other important detail with ease. (Class 10, U3 Speed Micro-SD Card for 4K Video is required)

Super Night Vision: Super clear vision on fast-moving objects day and night thanks to StarVis f/1.6 large aperture, and WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) that adapt to different light levels and reduce image noise in low light conditions. This dash cam gives you all day peace of mind.

GPS Tracking and More: This dash cam comes with GPS built in. So things like tracking your driving route, speed, location, etc. can be done at once easily. In addition, you can remotely (33ft) track the car on Google map via the app (WiFi required) or your our Windows and Mac GPSPlayer (USB-C cable required) and have extra peace of mind in case of an accident.

Never Miss the Key Moment: With high, medium, and low sensitivity levels, the 3-axis G Sensor will record 30 seconds before and after an incident and save a 60-second emergency video even the engine is off for you. And with Loop Recording, the SD card will never run out of space, as old non-emergency files will be auto overwritten for continuous recording. Plus the Parking Mode (hardware kit required, not included) records your car's surroundings 24/7 when you are away.

24/7 Peace of Mind: Built-in G-sensor detects impacts and locks the recording in case of an accident, so you can be sure that you'll have evidence of what happened. Along with the loop recording to ensure that you never miss a moment, ideal for long-distance driving. Also, a hardwire kit can be purchased separately to enable Parking mode.

Worry-Free Warranty: All HawkEv products are backed by 30-day money-back guarantee and 24-month quality warranty, a 12-hour response time and lifetime email/WhatsApp expert support. Based in New York, we are a team of engineers with 10 years of experience and constantly improve our products and services to your satisfaction.
Package includes HawkEvo HE-DC001 4K Dual Dash Cam x1, Power Cable with Car Charger x1, User Manual x1, GPS Mount x1, 3M Mount Adhesive x1, USB-C Cable x1, Cable Clips x6, Non-Marring Pry Bar x1

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Making the Night Bright 2 Emergency Recording 3 24/7 Parking Monitoring 4 Continuous Loop Recording 5 Easy Transmission

Next-generation structural design Built-in G-sensor detects impacts and locks the recording in case of an accident, so you can be sure that you'll have evidence of what happened. Along with the loop recording to ensure that you never miss a moment, ideal for long-distance driving. We've Got Your Back, And Front The front and the rear dash cams have 4K UHD/1080P FHD crisp video quality and 170°/140° wide viewing angles, keeping you in the know of what's happened to the front and back on the road. With sharp and vivid images, you can read number plates, road signs, and any other important detail with ease. Making the Night Bright Super clear vision on fast-moving objects day and night thanks to StarVis f/1.6 large aperture, and WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) that adapt to different light levels and reduce image noise in low light conditions. This dash cam gives you all day peace of mind. G-Sensor Emergency Recording HawkEvo 3 axis G-sensor with high, medium, and low sensitivity to trigger an emergency 30s video recording in case of an unexpected collision. Advanced funtion ensures accident feature is never overwritten when on loop recording.Now you'll never find yourself without valuable video evidence in the case disputes.
Previous page Next page 1 Easy Operation 2 Set up and Installation 3 Package Contents

Who we are? HawkEvo was founded by a group of car enthusiasts, based in New York. We care about car innovation and road safety. We strive to provide innovative solutions and superior-performance products to meet the needs of every drivers. What is the after-sales policy? HawkEvo offers 30-Day Money-Back Guaran-tee for Any Reason and 12+12 months after-sales repair. Please contact our support email or whatsapp: +1 (808) 364-6906 for any issue. How to downlad the APP? My Android can't download the APP Please scan the QR code on the manual or search "Dashgo" in the Apple Store or Google Play Store directly. If anyone has problem with downloading the APP, please contact our support email or whatsapp: +1 (808) 364-6906 How to connect the APP? Connect the smartphone with HawkEvo WiFi,(please disconnect with other devices when connecting with HawkEvo WiFi) then connect it. I want to use the parking monitoring function, how to buy a separate hardwire kit? Please search "HawkEvo hardwire kit" on Amazon or contact the support team to know how to get a hardwire kit for free. support email or whatsapp: +1 (808) 364-6906

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Video Clarity and 5-StarCustomer Service Experience
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the HawkEvo 4k+1080P Dual Dashcam, and I am beyond impressed with its performance and the exceptional features it offers. This dashcam has completely elevated my driving experience, providing unmatched video clarity, reliable customer service, a convenient app, and the invaluable G-sensor for added peace of mind.Let's start with the outstanding video clarity this dashcam delivers. The front camera's 4K resolution captures every detail with remarkable precision, ensuring that no important element goes unnoticed. The rear camera, with it's 1080p resolution, provides comprehensive coverage of the road behind me. The footage is exceptionally clear and vibrant, allowing for easy identification of license plates, road signs, and other critical details. Whether it's day or night driving, the video quality remains superb, guaranteeing that I won't miss a vital moment.The convenience of the accompanying app cannot be overstated. It seamlessly connects to the dashcam, enabling me to effortlessly view and download footage directly to my smartphone. Sharing recordings or saving them for future reference has never been easier.One of the standout features of this dashcam is its reliable G-sensor. Upon detecting sudden movements or impacts, it instantly saves and locks the corresponding footage. This crucial functionality ensures that important evidence is protected and cannot be overwritten. In case of accidents or unexpected incidents, having a trustworthy eyewitness recording provides invaluable. support and peace of mind.The customer service I've received from the company has been exemplary. They have been highly responsive and attentive to my needs and promptly addressing my concerns, their commitment to customer satisfaction is truly commendable.Installing the dashcam was hassle-free, thanks to the clear instructions and included accessories. The sleek and unobtrusive design of the cameras seamlessly blends with my car's interior, ensuring they don't obstruct my view. The sturdy build quality of the dashcam instills confidence that it will withstand the demands of daily use.If you're seeking a reliable and affordable 4K dashcam with outstanding features, this is the one to choose. You won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Remarkable Dashcam That Beats High-End Brands in Performance and Price
reviews.reviewText: I don't normally write extensive review like this, but I've been using high-end brand dashcams for years, and the Hawkevo Dual Dashcam has truly left me astounded. Not only does it outperform those expensive brands, but it comes at a fraction of the price, making it an absolute steal.First off, let's talk about the design. The Hawkevo Dasheam has a sleek and modern outlook thatseamlessly blends with my car's interior. It adds a touch of sophistication without being too flashy.Butts the performance that blew me away. The front facing 4K camera captures every detail ofthe road with stunning clarity. Seriously the video quality is on par with those high-end dashcamsve paid a small fortune for in the past.What really surprised me is the user-friendly app that comes with the dashcam. With just a fewtaps on my smartphone, | can access and download the recorded videos. The app's interface isintuitive, making it easy to navigate through settings and customize options to suit mypreferences. It's convenient and adds an extra level of ease to managing the dashcam.The Hawkevo Dual Dashcam 4K+1080p is a remarkable pice of technology that has exceeded allmy expectations. It performs better than those pricey high-end brands and costs significantly les.The sleek design, crystal-clear video quality, and user-friendly app make it clear winner in themarket. If you're in the market for a reliable and affordable dashcam that delivers outstandingperformance, look no further. The Hawkevo Dual Dashcam 4K+1080p is the real deal, and |couldn't be happier with my purchase!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cam for the money
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: The cam started telling me the as card was slow and I needed to get a class 10 card, but the card I’m using is a class 10 card. Anyone else experience this?This is a great dash cam. I had high hopes for this camera and it met every one. Video quality is great and it’s very easy to access and download the recorded videos. Very user friendly. You won’t be disappointed.
